description: Are we ready for another hard-slamming match? Tough boy Christian Owen is all muscle and cock, but he lacks fighting skills. Lexx Scott shows up with his own singlet, ready to fight. Christian's only strategy is to hang on tight. During the match, all hell breaks loose as Christian is relentless in his use of headlocks and leg scissors. One fighter turns the other into a bitch for the day and fucks him in the end.
title: Christian Owen vs Lexx Scott
